hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The hand is not to be cut off for (stealing) produce or the spadix of palm trees.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُقْطَعُ فِي ثَمَرٍ وَلاَ كَثَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: : The Hand Is Not To Be Cut Off For (Stealing) Produce Or The Spadix (Marrow) of Palm Tree
